meta.description: Determine the optimal number of tables, chairs, and bookshelves to produce in order to maximize profit, considering manufacturing costs, selling prices, warehouse space, and market demand.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of furniture products produced by the factory.

params.name: space_required
params.description: Warehouse space required for each product.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each product to produce.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: sum((selling_price[p] - manufacturing_cost[p]) * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from selling the products.

constraints.name: warehouse_space_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(space_required[p] * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total warehouse space used cannot exceed 500 square meters.

constraints.name: min_tables
constraints.description: At least 10 tables must be produced.

constraints.name: min_bookshelves
constraints.description: At least 20 bookshelves must be produced.

constraints.name: max_total_items
constraints.description: Total number of items produced cannot exceed 200.
